data.text:
httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aWWP4xtxXXE

So, Iâ€™m like the biggest music junkie ever and I listen to all types of music with the exception of country. Yes, I do not do the Carrie Underwoodâ€™s or Taylor Swiftsâ€™ of the world. Honesty, I just never really got into that whole genre of music even though I live in the heart of music cityâ€“Nashville. Crazy huh?

Oh well, the latest music that Iâ€™ve put on my iPod is Wiz Khalifa. Thanks to my â€œfriend boyâ€ as my daddy would call him. Iâ€™m listening to Wiz Khalifa like there are no other artists in the industry including Lilâ€™ Wayne. Just in one week, Iâ€™ve downloaded three of his mix tapes and have listened to all of them every day if not every other day. I love it. Wiz Khalifaâ€™s music is nothing like Boosie, Travis Porter, or Soulja Boy. Donâ€™t get me wrong, I listen to all of them, but Wiz Khalifa is definitely a head bopper with a calm aesthetic. I like him because he sounds so different from all the other artists out there. Heâ€™s a mix between hype and calm. To understand what I mean by this, you must first listen to Flight School, followed by Kush & OJ, and end with Star Power.

On to the next artist . . . pretty boy rapper, Drake. Today marks the day that his album, â€œThank Me later,â€ was leaked online. Even though it was scheduled to release three weeks from now, my friends and I decided to take advantage of the leak. And I must say that it is the BEST . . . perfect rhymes . . . and perfect beats. And letâ€™s be honest, I know that my friends and I are not the only ones who have downloaded it â€œfreely.â€ I know some of you at this very moment are bobbing your heads to a free copy of â€œThank Me Later.â€

Isnâ€™t it sad? Truly, I believe in supporting the artist, but I am also a music junkie and a borderline Drakeâ€™s groupie so sometimes I choose to â€œsampleâ€ the music freely. Honestly, I donâ€™t mind either portrayalâ€“groupie or junkie. I just love my music because itâ€™s always there with the message that I need to here during any situation and circumstance. Itâ€™s just food for my soul.

So, I leave you with my favorite song Iâ€™ve downloaded from Chris Brownâ€™s album, Deuces, entitled â€œFan of a Fan.â€ Enjoy ğŸ™‚
